data.message: Debug and fix vec_score showing 0.00 in Duro semantic search: Found key name mismatch in ranking_config.py:explain_score() - was looking for "vector"/"bm25" but hybrid_search creates "vec_score"/"fts_score". Fixed lines 290 and 299. Cosine distance migration was correctly applied, embeddings work fine (0.70+ similarity scores), only the explain text display was wrong.
data.task: Debug and fix vec_score showing 0.00 in Duro semantic search
data.outcome: Found key name mismatch in ranking_config.py:explain_score() - was looking for "vector"/"bm25" but hybrid_search creates "vec_score"/"fts_score". Fixed lines 290 and 299. Cosine distance migration was correctly applied, embeddings work fine (0.70+ similarity scores), only the explain text display was wrong.
